subject: Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jason Buursma pitches, hits, plays all over the field and even plays the game music for Bucknell’s team. Name the task, and he has handled it as the Bison’s do-it-all star.
snippet: Jason Buursma pitches, hits, plays all over the field and even plays the game music for Bucknell’s team. Name the task, and he has handled it as the Bison’s do-it-all star.
